name: Hormazd I #522
description:
This collection belongs to the Sassani kings period, which the people of that time called Iranshahr, they ruled Great Iran from 224 to 652 AD. And what you are witnessing now is an exquisite and refreshing collection of coins decorated with the image of the kings of Iranshahr, which IS designed with a little involvement and change in the form of pop art.

Year of completion: 2020
Dimensions: 80*80 CM
Type& material: Oil on Canvas & Silver Sheet
